Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Eatsbound Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison and #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Rosemont. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
